TopicTitle: Community Kerbal Contest! Make a video, win indie games! Part 2: The Antarctic Race!

Articles.Content:
Well here goes, I have some steam codes lying around from past Humble Indie Bundles, so I figured I'd use them as a prize for a Community Contest!

-1st Place Prize: Humble Indie Bundle 3

-2nd & 3rd: Thomas was Alone, Or Capsized.

-Runners up: Thanks for participating!

Here is a video with more details and a cool plane:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KhbTwhL_X5A

The rules are simple:

1) It must be a video.

2) Submissions must be posted as a video response to the above video so commenters, me and entrants can easily see what the community is up to!.

3) Mods are allowed.

4) Videos do not have to be new, if you made one a while ago that you like, feel free to enter it!

5) There are no limits to how many videos you can submit.

6) Entrants must be submitted by Sunday, June 16th!

Well, that's about it! Feel free to message me, or comment down below if you have any further questions.

If you don't win, don't worry, this isn't a one-off as I have plenty steam codes!

Edited June 19, 2013 by Asmosdeus

Well, out of the 2 people that entered, 2 people won! ._.

Holding another contest, fastest flight to the south pole wins.

Same rules apply, except entrants must be submitted by Sunday, June 30th!

The Prizes for this round are:

Jamestown

Bit.Trip Runner

Super Meat Boy

Shank

NightSky HD

Cave Story+

Gratuitous Space Battles

See video below for details!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zEjD45LU6w8

I wasn't even aware of this. :/ Oh well. I'll pay closer attention next time.

Edit: Ok.. So that "paying attention" thing didn't work considering you said that its on going NOW... unfortunately I won't have time before the end of the month. *pout*
I'm doing these ever 10 days, so don't worry

Well, the contest has it's first entry, hopefully the first of many!

http://http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k0dJ9nbS5Q0
Yay a prize that means something! Count me in.
